[{"id":"JT-48288","entityId":"25-2051260","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48288"},{"name":"summary","value":"Merge duplicated events on client side"},{"name":"description","value":"

In YTB-422 there is 2 events for linking this issue with another one. This can be reproduced locally with debugging backend.

Since fix this events on the backend is extremely expensive. We decided to fix (merge) them on frontend.

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1531812423690"},{"name":"updated","value":"1531813367273"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"maksimrv"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Maksim Ryzhikov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Alexey.Volkov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexey Volkov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-48163","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-731","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 71","id":"YouTrack:sprint 71"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-48280","entityId":"25-2051028","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48280"},{"name":"summary","value":"Fix color for triangle for Context"},{"name":"description","value":"

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1531812775904,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-47872","entityId":"25-2030367","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47872"},{"name":"summary","value":"Project logo is not updated on the overview and in projects list"},{"name":"description","value":"

build 42711

STR:

  1. Update project logo
  2. In the same tab go to overview of this project
  3. Then go to the projects list

AR:
On both pages there's old logo instead of new

After page refresh actual logo is shown

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1529944714306"},{"name":"updated","value":"1531780169495"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Ekaterina_Zaikina"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Ekaterina Zaikina"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Ekaterina.Alekseeva"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Ekaterina Alekseeva"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"5"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JPS-8821","type":"Depend","role":"depends on"},{"value":"YTB-18","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"Ekaterina_Zaikina","fullName":"Ekaterina Zaikina"}]},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Projects"],"valueId":["Projects"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 71","id":"YouTrack:sprint 71"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-2944127","author":"Ekaterina_Zaikina","authorFullName":"Ekaterina Zaikina","issueId":"JT-47872","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Evgeny Naumenko could you please add updated timestamp to project logo url?

Actually there is same problem in hub, which is assigned to @Alexander Sedov. Probably it will be fixed in YouTrack automatically after hub's fix

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1531145966477,"updated":1531146136503,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2944225","author":"jk","authorFullName":"Evgeny Naumenko","issueId":"JT-47872","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Ekaterina Zaikina no, I could not. As you may have noticed this URL comes from Hub and should be fixed there.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1531147814238,"updated":1531148149279,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2944233","author":"Ekaterina_Zaikina","authorFullName":"Ekaterina Zaikina","issueId":"JT-47872","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

(I'am other Ekaterina)

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1531147996782,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2956215","author":"jk","authorFullName":"Evgeny Naumenko","issueId":"JT-47872","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Ekaterina Zaikina backend returns etag in query url now. It doesn't seem to help though.

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1531764333495,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2956589","author":"Ekaterina_Zaikina","authorFullName":"Ekaterina Zaikina","issueId":"JT-47872","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

@Evgeny Naumenko could you please check this:

POST: http://localhost:9090/api/admin/projects/0-12
{icon: '<base64string>'}

See response of POST: sometimes iconUrl is updated, but sometimes old iconUrl is returned
Try GET project after a while: updated iconUrl is returned no matter which icon was returned as POST-response

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1531780169503,"updated":1531147996581,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-47780","entityId":"25-2026938","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47780"},{"name":"summary","value":"Show diff details in a history view is not shown in case it's the first item with the following expand control [...]"},{"name":"description","value":"

For example try to expand details of first history item on this issue DTRC-25281

STR:

  1. Open new FSI with changes (it should contains Summary changed: Details and show more changes button)
  2. Expand Details
    AR: nothing will happen (there is no details).
    N.B. click on "show more changes button" and then click on Details -- it works
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1529574784497,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2920466","author":"Mikhail.Kapusta","authorFullName":"Mikhail Kapusta","issueId":"JT-47780","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"

Thank you for the bug,
temporary workaround: click on show more changes button (triple dot) and then expand Details

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1531662709859,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":"YouTrack Team","markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"has external deps","cssClass":"c20"}]}, {"id":"JT-48243","entityId":"25-2049112","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"48243"},{"name":"summary","value":"Activity stream loaders are not flashing while waiting to start receiving response"},{"name":"description","value":"

2018.2.43478

tl;dr any activity stream tab won't flash during Waiting phase of request to backend (in terms of HAR / network monitor).

STR:

  1. Open any SIV
  2. Toggle off activity stream history tab.
  3. Throttle activity stream endpoint for that issue down to 10bps
  4. Switch activity stream history on.

Expected result: history activity stream icon starts flashing shortly.
Actual result: you have to wait for a long time until history icon starts flashing. See attached screencap: it starts to flash after about 1 minute of wait.

How item selection should work?

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1529484479089,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]},{"id":"27-2919033","author":"mitya","authorFullName":"Dmitry Gizatov","issueId":"JT-46353","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov I think we should select every single item. It's important for spent time items because we have actions on them.
","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1529488128367,"updated":null,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":false,"replies":[]}],"tag":[{"value":"Star","cssClass":"c0"}]}, {"id":"JT-45884","entityId":"25-1870937","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"45884"},{"name":"summary","value":"Better presentation for issue changed notification"},{"name":"description","value":"
Live stream update. Some improvements for JT-44464

For any active switcher (comment/history item/VCS changes/Upsourse reviews/Spent time)
If we can see a change it's just blink

If we can't see a change we should show anchor link on the last changed item with a counter. In this case the "3 New comments"

And in this case "15 new changes" because 2 switches are active.

For inactive switcher (comment/history item/VCS changes/Upsourse reviews/Spent time)
We should show red bulb with a counter. On hover shows a tooltip with info.

Also, this panel should stick to the bottom


Version 1…
Version 1
1) Only custom fields updates show like popup
2) Better presentation of how many and what kind of changes you have
